ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Heroin Since Last Use (Days)
How many hits, smokes, snorts did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use heroin?
And how many hits, smokes, snorts etc did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (heroin)
Other Opiates Since Last Use (Days)
How many pills, doses, etc. did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use opiates other than heroin?
And how many pills, doses, etc did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (opiates other than heroin)
How many days ago did you last use marijuana?
How many joints, bongs etc did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use marijuana?
And how many joints, bongs, etc did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (marijuana)
Amphetamines (e.g. Speed) Since Last Use (Days)
How many tablets, snorts, hits etc did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use amphetamines?
And how many tablets, snorts, hits etc did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (amphetamines)
How many days ago did you last use cocaine?
How many snorts, hits, smokes etc did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use cocaine?
And how many snorts, hits, smokes etc did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (cocaine)
How many days ago did you last use tranquilisers?
How many pills did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use tranquilisers?
And how many pills did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (tranquilisers)
How many days ago did you last use barbiturates?
How many pills did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use barbiturates?
And how many pills did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (barbiturates)
"Hallucinogens (e.g. PCP, LSD) Since Last Use (Days)"
How many tabs, pills etc did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use hallucinogens?
And how many tabs, pills etc did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (hallucinogens)
How many days ago did you last use inhalants?
How many sniffs did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use inhalants?
And how many sniffs did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (inhalants)
How many days ago did you last use synthetic drugs?
How many smokes, bongs etc did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use synthetic drugs?
And how many smokes, bongs etc did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (synthetic drugs)
How many days ago did you last use tobacco?
How many cigarettes did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use tobacco?
And how many cigarettes did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (tobacco)
How many days ago did you last use alcohol?
How many drinks did you have on that day?
How many days before that did you use alcohol?
And how many drinks did you have on that day?
And when was the day before that? (alcohol)
